name: PixelFem #54 - Hannah Arendt
description:
Brilliant and controversial, Hannah Arendt was a German-trained political theorist who became one of America’s most prominent intellectuals and whose books exerted a major impact on political theory. Arendt was the first woman to become a full professor at Princeton University. Arendt spent the 1930s as a political activist in Germany and Paris.

✺This work is part of PixelFems, an evolving project on the Tezos blockchain celebrating iconic women from the past and present✺
